titles.title: I Give You Glory (feat. Juri Friesen)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse:
Oh, how beautiful are You, Lord
It's Your words it's Your love
Oh, how glorious are You, Lord
It's Your power
It was Your cross

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Pre chorus:
That saved me and rescued me
Just a moment there set me free

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
I give You glory, glory
I give You glory, glory
I give You glory, glory
Jesus

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
With a crown of thorns
You became my King forever
With a crown of thorns
You became my King forever

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
With a crown of thorns
You became my King forever
With a crown of thorns
You became my King forever
With a crown of thorns
You became my King forever
With a crown of thorns
You became my King forever
